tableClientInPurpose.noClientsAssociatedToPurposeLabel: No clients associated with this purpose

create.title: Create new client
create.description: Once the client is created, you can always add and remove operators and public keys to use for accessing producers' e-services

nameField.label: Client name (required)
nameField.infoLabel: Helps you distinguish it from others. Min 5 characters, max 60 characters

clientOperatorsSection.title: Client members
clientOperatorsSection.description: You can manage the client members at any time, even after creation

addOperatorsDrawer.title: Add members to client
addOperatorsDrawer.adminAlert: If you want to upload public keys for this client, also add yourself to the client

addPublicKeyDrawer.title: Enter new public key
addPublicKeyDrawer.description: Don't know how to create a set of cryptographic material? <1>Read the guide</1>.

nameInput.label: Key name (required)
nameInput.infoLabel: It will help you distinguish it from others. Min 5 characters, max 60 characters

alertApiV2.description: PDND will soon update its API model to version 2. In the future, it will no longer be possible to interact with the previous version.

adminSection.title: Admin API
adminSection.description: The Client Admin API is a user belonging to the party who is authorized to perform write operations through the machine-to-machine channel.

setClientAdminDrawer.subtitle: You can enable a client member for writing via API in the machine-to-machine flow.

adminField.label: Client Admin API
adminField.infoLabel: You can choose only one member per client.

validation.sameValue: The Client Admin API must be different from the current one

tabs.ariaLabel: Three different tabs for voucher acquisition instructions, client members, and public keys
tabs.voucher: How do I get a voucher?
